document_data.name: Snail-and-Eel Soup
document_data.mainbody:
'''Snail-and-eel soup''' was a [[soup]] dish made by the [[lizardfolk]] of the [[Vast Swamp]] of [[Cormyr]], made from snails and [[eel]]s.

In the [[1374|Year of Lightning Storms, 1374 DR]], the [[Sharptooth]] tribe brewed snail-and-eel soup in a hot spring at [[Vast Swamp geyser|their encampment]] in the swamp. The chieftain [[Kessessek]] offered this concoction to adventurers investigating [[Shar]]ran activities there as they parlayed.
